11.eng-name: The Rites of Hajj (Kitab Al-Manasik Wa'l-Hajj)

hadiths.text: Ai’shah said :I twisted the garlands of the sacrificial animals of the Messenger of Allah (SWAS) with my own hands, after which he made incision in their humps and garlanded them, and sent them as offerings to the house (Kabah), but he himself stayed back at Madinah and nothing which had been lawful for him had been forbidden

chapter.eng-name: Regarding One Who Sends A Sacrificial Animal But Remains In Residence
